EmailTemplate.name: RE: Your MBO account is now active (1332339095.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Your MBO account is now active (1332339095.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Norman, Welcome to MBO Partners! Here are some important reminders to be aware of: - Here are some time and expense entry instructions for using our system. - Here is a copy of our expense policy. - Here is a list of the most common expenses <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_Time_and_Expense_Entry_Instructions.pdf> you can submit to MBO. The next step is to schedule another time that works for you so we can do a walk-through of the business center and I can show you all the great features. I look forward to working with you! Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> sconde@mbopartners.com [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2012 8:04 AM To: nfong8@gmail.com Subject: Your MBO account is now active Dear Norman, You have now completed the enrollment process. Your Business Center account is now active. I will continue to be your point of contact as you further your career with MBO Partners. If you would like to schedule a time to walk through the MBO system together, please let me know. Should you have any additional questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to working with you. Thank you,Sara CondeBusiness Manager Direct: 703-793-6028 Toll Free: 800-556-0270MBO Partners13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300Herndon, VA 20171]http://www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
